H0.text: Name the Latvian born dancer from the Kirov Ballet who defected to the West in 1974.. Mikhail Baryshnikov's contemporary, Alexander Godunov

H1.text: Name the Latvian born dancer from the Kirov Ballet who defected to the West in 1974.. Latvian ballet dancer, Maris Liepa

H2.text: Name the Latvian born dancer from the Kirov Ballet who defected to the West in 1974.. Soviet ballet dancer, Rudolf Nureyev

H3.text: Name the Latvian born dancer from the Kirov Ballet who defected to the West in 1974.. Barishnikov

A4.text: He was a part of the Stanislavsky and Nemirovich-Danchenko Moscow Academic Music Theatre, and after four seasons he became one of the lead artists.

A5.text: He worked as a ballet teacher and became the artistic director of Sofia National Opera between 1983 and 1985.
